content:
Microsoft.Activities.Build.Validation Namespace

Definition

The Microsoft.Activities.Build.Validationprovides classes related to build validation.

In this Article

Classes

DeferredValidationTask

Represents a task for deferring validation.
ReportDeferredValidationErrorsTask

Represents a task that reports any deferred validation errors.
